actionTemplate.title: Open inner-corner liner
steps: Draw a thin upper liner close to the lashes
Extend a small inner-corner point along the natural angle
Connect the point back to the upper lash line to form a tiny V
Keep outer liner thin or add a small tail
Clean inner corner with a swab for sharpness

rationaleTemplate: A defined inner corner makes eyes look longer and sharper
Small V-shape stays natural and avoids looking messy
